name: IXL Math - Kindergarten
description: Comprehensive kindergarten math curriculum with 200+ skills. Counting to 20, number recognition, basic addition and subtraction, shapes, patterns, measurement, and comparison. Adaptive practice with instant feedback.

name: IXL Math - 1st Grade
description: First grade math with 300+ skills. Addition and subtraction within 20, place value, time, money, measurement, data and graphs, and geometry. Standards-aligned adaptive learning.

name: IXL Math - 2nd Grade
description: Second grade math covering 400+ skills. Addition and subtraction within 100, place value to 1000, multiplication foundations, fractions, measurement, time, money, and data analysis.

name: IXL Math - 3rd Grade
description: Third grade math with 500+ skills. Multiplication and division, fractions, area and perimeter, time, measurement, data, and problem-solving. Interactive practice with real-world applications.

name: IXL Math - 4th Grade
description: Fourth grade math covering 600+ skills. Multi-digit multiplication and division, fractions and decimals, measurement conversions, geometry, and data interpretation. Comprehensive skill building.

name: IXL Math - 5th Grade
description: Fifth grade math with 700+ skills. Decimal operations, fraction operations, volume, coordinate planes, and algebraic thinking. Prepare for middle school mathematics.

name: IXL Math - 6th Grade
description: Sixth grade math covering 800+ skills. Ratios, rates, percentages, negative numbers, algebraic expressions, equations, area, surface area, and statistics. Middle school mathematics foundation.

name: IXL Math - 7th Grade
description: Seventh grade math with 900+ skills. Proportional relationships, rational numbers, linear equations, geometric constructions, probability, and statistics. Advanced middle school topics.

name: IXL Math - 8th Grade
description: Eighth grade math covering 1000+ skills. Linear functions, systems of equations, transformations, Pythagorean theorem, exponents, and scientific notation. Algebra 1 preparation.

name: IXL Math - Algebra 1
description: Complete Algebra 1 curriculum with 1000+ skills. Linear equations, inequalities, systems, quadratic functions, polynomials, factoring, and exponential functions. High school mathematics foundation.

name: IXL Math - Geometry
description: Comprehensive geometry curriculum with 900+ skills. Proofs, transformations, congruence, similarity, trigonometry, circles, and coordinate geometry. Visual and interactive practice.

name: IXL Math - Algebra 2
description: Advanced algebra with 1100+ skills. Polynomials, rational expressions, logarithms, sequences, series, conic sections, and complex numbers. College preparatory mathematics.

name: IXL Math - Precalculus
description: Precalculus curriculum with 800+ skills. Advanced functions, trigonometry, vectors, matrices, parametric equations, and polar coordinates. Preparation for calculus.

name: IXL Math - Calculus
description: Calculus curriculum covering limits, derivatives, integrals, and applications. AP Calculus AB/BC aligned content with comprehensive practice problems.

name: IXL Science - 2nd Grade
description: Elementary science curriculum with 150+ skills. Plants and animals, habitats, matter, forces, energy, weather, and scientific inquiry. Interactive diagrams and real-world scenarios.

name: IXL Science - 3rd Grade
description: Third grade science with 200+ skills. Life cycles, ecosystems, properties of matter, forces and motion, weather patterns, and engineering design. NGSS-aligned curriculum.

name: IXL Science - 4th Grade
description: Fourth grade science covering 250+ skills. Energy transfer, waves, structures of life, Earth systems, natural resources, and technology. Interactive science simulations.
stem_fields: Science, Physics, Biology, Earth Science, Technology

name: IXL Science - 5th Grade
description: Fifth grade science with 300+ skills. Matter and energy, ecosystems, Earth systems, space systems, and engineering solutions. Comprehensive elementary science conclusion.
stem_fields: Science, Physics, Biology, Earth Science, Space Science

name: IXL Science - 6th Grade
description: Sixth grade science covering 350+ skills. Cell structure, genetics, plate tectonics, energy resources, thermal energy, and scientific investigation. Middle school science foundation.
stem_fields: Science, Biology, Earth Science, Physics, Genetics

name: IXL Science - 7th Grade
description: Seventh grade science with 400+ skills. Chemical reactions, force and motion, waves, evolution, biodiversity, Earth history, and climate. Advanced middle school topics.
stem_fields: Science, Chemistry, Physics, Biology, Earth Science

name: IXL Science - 8th Grade
description: Eighth grade science covering 450+ skills. Atomic structure, periodic table, motion and forces, energy, reproduction, inheritance, and astronomy. High school science preparation.

name: IXL Science - Biology
description: High school biology curriculum with 500+ skills. Cell biology, genetics, evolution, ecology, human body systems, and scientific practices. Comprehensive life science course.

name: IXL Science - Chemistry
description: High school chemistry with 450+ skills. Atomic theory, chemical bonding, stoichiometry, thermodynamics, kinetics, equilibrium, and acid-base chemistry. College preparatory chemistry.

name: IXL Science - Physics
description: High school physics covering 400+ skills. Mechanics, energy, waves, electricity, magnetism, and modern physics. Mathematical problem-solving and conceptual understanding.

name: IXL Science - Earth Science
description: High school Earth science with 350+ skills. Geology, meteorology, oceanography, astronomy, and environmental science. Study Earth systems and space.

name: IXL Social Studies - Elementary (K-5)
description: Elementary social studies covering geography, history, civics, and culture. Map skills, historical events, community, and citizenship concepts. Interactive content for young learners.

name: IXL Language Arts - Reading Comprehension (All Grades)
description: Comprehensive reading comprehension across K-12. Literary analysis, informational texts, vocabulary development, and critical reading skills. Adaptive leveled passages.

name: IXL Spanish - Elementary to High School
description: Spanish language learning across all levels. Vocabulary, grammar, verb conjugations, reading comprehension, and cultural understanding. Interactive language practice.

name: IXL Analytics - Student Progress Tracking
description: Comprehensive analytics dashboard tracking student progress, skill mastery, time spent, and areas needing improvement. Real-time insights for parents and teachers. Included with subscription.

name: IXL Diagnostic - Adaptive Assessment
description: Adaptive diagnostic assessment identifying student knowledge gaps and strengths across subjects. Creates personalized learning paths based on assessment results. Continuous diagnostic throughout learning.

name: IXL Awards and Certificates
description: Motivation system with awards, certificates, and achievement tracking. Students earn awards for skill mastery, practice time, and continuous learning. Gamification elements to encourage engagement.
